TestCase.name: testPushLocalHashAggregateCountAcrossOneUnionAll
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT * FROM MyTable1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM MyTable2 ) as T GROUP BY id

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$1], $f1=[1]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[id], select=[id, Final_COUNT(count1$0) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[id]]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[id, $f1]) :- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[id], select=[id, Partial_COUNT(*) AS count1$0]) : +- Calc(select=[id, 1 AS $f1]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[id], select=[id, Partial_COUNT(*) AS count1$0]) +- Calc(select=[id, 1 AS $f1]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price])

TestCase.name: testPushLocalHashAggregateCountAcrossMultipleUnionAll
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT * FROM MyTable1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM MyTable2 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM MyTable3 ) as T GROUP BY id

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$1], $f1=[1]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) : :- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]]) : +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[id], select=[id, Final_COUNT(count1$0) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[id]]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[id, $f1]) :- Union(all=[true], union=[id, $f1]) : :- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[id], select=[id, Partial_COUNT(*) AS count1$0]) : : +- Calc(select=[id, 1 AS $f1]) : : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[id], select=[id, Partial_COUNT(*) AS count1$0]) : +- Calc(select=[id, 1 AS $f1]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[id], select=[id, Partial_COUNT(*) AS count1$0]) +- Calc(select=[id, 1 AS $f1]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price])

TestCase.name: testPushLocalHashAggregateSumAcrossOneUnionAll
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, SUM(amount) FROM ( SELECT id, amount FROM MyTable1 UNION ALL SELECT id, amount FROM MyTable2 ) as T GROUP BY id

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(id=[$1], amount=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$1], amount=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[id], select=[id, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[id]]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[id, amount]) :- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[id], select=[id, Partial_SUM(amount) AS sum$0]) : +- Calc(select=[id, amount]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[id], select=[id, Partial_SUM(amount) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[id, amount]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price])

TestCase.name: testPushLocalHashAggregateSumAcrossMultipleUnionAll

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[id], select=[id, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[id]]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[id, amount]) :- Union(all=[true], union=[id, amount]) : :- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[id], select=[id, Partial_SUM(amount) AS sum$0]) : : +- Calc(select=[id, amount]) : : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[id], select=[id, Partial_SUM(amount) AS sum$0]) : +- Calc(select=[id, amount]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[id], select=[id, Partial_SUM(amount) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[id, amount]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [aggregatePushedDown=[false], groupSet=[null], aggregators=[null], producedDataType=[ROW<`name` STRING, `id` BIGINT, `amount` INT, `price` DOUBLE>]]]], fields=[name, id, amount, price])
